item.title: About me
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: I like IT among many other things, I like free software. I find great joy in designing and creating IT systems that work well. Tech is not my only passion. I’m also interested in philosophy and mindfulness.
